https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyclic_redundancy_check#Computation

WP example              My impl. step-by-step
11010011101100 000      11010011101100 000
1011                    
01100011101100 000      01100011101100 000
 1011                   
00111011101100 000      00111011101100 000
  1011      
00010111101100 000      00010111101100 000
   1011     
00000001101100 000      00000001101100 000
       1011             
00000000110100 000      00000000110100 000
        1011        
00000000011000 000      00000000011000 000
         1011       
00000000001110 000      00000000001110 000
          1011      
00000000000101 000      00000000000101 000
           101 1        
-----------------       
00000000000000 100      00000000000000 100
